txt.en: Thraknûl and Urudanî have returned to Naerband and there is little hope that you will be able to escape the prison fortress alive.

'On the edge of the secret footpath through the mountain we were ambushed by a group of Ghâsh-hai. They are working for Thraknûl, no doubt!

'The Uruk must have caught wind of our victory at Orodir and went searching for us! I bargained with the Orcs to let my people go. In return, I would give up my own life and Thraknûl could do as he wished. At the time, I did not think you would still be in Naerband.

'I will go return to my people now. They need someone to guide them. Many of the Nurnhoth have never tasted freedom. Their will is broken. I hope to fix that.

'Farewell [placeholder]. I will not forget you.'
Akhrûn can be found at the foothills near Naerband.\n\nYou should speak with Akhrûn before she leaves for Nurn.
'I have been brought here by Ghâsh-hai! Thraknûl plans to torture me and make an example of me to those who care not for his twisted rules. We must escape!'
